Name of donor: Labour Friends of Bangladesh
Address of donor: 349 Cambridge Heath Road, London E2 9
RA
Estimate of the probable value (or amount of any donation): Flights, hotels and internal transport with an estimated value of £2,500
Destination of visit: Dhaka and Sylhet, Bangladesh
Date of visit: 11 to 17 February 2017
Purpose of visit: Meetings with representatives of Bangladesh government and opposition leaders, meetings at Bangladesh Parliament, meetings with charitable organisations and British/Bangladeshi business organisations.(Registered 24 February 2017)

Name of donor: Policy Network and Communications Ltd
Address of donor: 11 Tufton Street, London, SW1
P 3
QB
Estimate of the probable value (or amount of any donation): Flights costing £252.27; hotel costs of £111.51; ground transportation costing £67.70; total value £431.43
Destination of visit: Berlin, Germany
Date of visit: 3 to 4 July 2017
Purpose of visit: To attend and participate in the Progressive Governance Symposium 2017 with leading politicians, academics and policymakers from across Europe and north America.(Registered 08 August 2017)

Dates of visit: 15 - 17 September 2017
Purpose of visit: To attend and participate in the Global Progress Summit Symposium 2017 with international leading politicians, academics and policymakers.(Registered 19 October 2017)
